# zx_clock_adjust

## NAME

## STATUS

`zx_clock_adjust` is currently **DEPRECATED**. Do not make use of it in any new code.

## SYNOPSIS

<!-- Updated by update-docs-from-fidl, do not edit. -->

```c
#include <zircon/syscalls.h>

zx_status_t zx_clock_adjust(zx_handle_t handle,
                            zx_clock_t clock_id,
                            int64_t offset);
```
